en: National University of Political Science and Governance

location.zh-cn: 中华民国台湾省台北市文山区
location.en: Wenshan District, Taipei, Taiwan, Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 一所位于台湾台北市的研究型国立大学。1947年由中央政治学校和中央干部学校在南京合并而成，后因第二次国共内战停止办学。1954年在台湾复校，是以人文社会科学领域为主的顶尖学府。
description.en: A research-oriented national university located in Taipei, Taiwan. It was formed in 1947 in Nanjing by the merger of the Central Political School and the Central Cadre School, and ceased operations due to the Chinese Civil War. It was re-established in Taiwan in 1954 and is a leading institution focusing on humanities and social sciences.

description.zh-cn: 国立政治大学的前身之一，由中国国民党创办，旨在培养党务与政治干部。1927年成立时名为中央党务学校，1929年更名。1947年与中央干部学校合并改组为国立政治大学。
description.en: A predecessor of National Chengchi University, founded by the Kuomintang to train party and political cadres. Established in 1927 as the Central Party Affairs School and renamed in 1929. In 1947, it merged with the Central Cadre School to form National Chengchi University.

description.zh-cn: 国立政治大学的前身之一，由三民主义青年团于1944年创立，旨在培养青年干部。1947年与中央政治学校合并改组为国立政治大学。
description.en: A predecessor of National Chengchi University, founded in 1944 by the Three Principles of the People Youth Corps to train youth cadres. In 1947, it merged with the Central Political School to form National Chengchi University.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的政党，创立了国立政治大学的前身中央党务学校。
description.en: A political party in the Republic of China, which founded the Central Party Affairs School, the predecessor of National Chengchi University.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治及军事人物，曾任国立政治大学前身中央党务学校、中央政治学校、中央干部学校的首任校长。
description.en: A political and military figure of the Republic of China, who served as the first president of the Central Party Affairs School, Central Political School, and Central Cadre School, predecessors of National Chengchi University.

en: Three Principles of the People Youth Corps

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党的青年组织，其下属的中央干部学校后并入国立政治大学。
description.en: The youth organization of the Kuomintang, whose Central Cadre School was later merged into National Chengchi University.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中央干部学校教育长。
description.en: A political figure of the Republic of China, who served as the Dean of Education at the Central Cadre School.

en: Ministry of Education of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国中央行政机关，主管教育事务。
description.en: The central administrative agency of the Republic of China responsible for educational affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党与中国共产党之间于1945年至1949年发生的内战，导致国立政治大学在大陆停止办学。
description.en: A civil war fought between the Kuomintang and the Communist Party of China from 1945 to 1949, which led to the suspension of National Chengchi University's operations on the mainland.

en: Retreat of the government of the Republic of China to Taiwan

description.zh-cn: 指1949年前后，中华民国政府因第二次国共内战失利而将中央政府迁移至台湾的历史事件。此事件促成了国立政治大学于1954年在台复校。
description.en: Refers to the historical event around 1949 when the government of the Republic of China relocated its central government to Taiwan after its defeat in the Chinese Civil War. This event led to the re-establishment of National Chengchi University in Taiwan in 1954.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国总统，并曾在国立政治大学任教。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, who served as President of the Republic of China and once taught at National Chengchi University.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国总统，并曾在国立政治大学任教。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, who served as President of the Republic of China and once taught at National Chengchi University.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国总统，并曾在国立政治大学任教。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, who served as President of the Republic of China and once taught at National Chengchi University.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国副总统。他既是国立政治大学校友，也曾担任该校校长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, who served as Vice President of the Republic of China. He was an alumnus of National Chengchi University and also served as its president.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国副总统，为国立政治大学校友。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, who served as Vice President of the Republic of China and is an alumnus of National Chengchi University.

description.zh-cn: 中国学者及教育家，曾任国立政治大学在大陆时期的首任专任校长。
description.en: A Chinese scholar and educator who served as the first full-time president of National Chengchi University during its mainland period.

description.zh-cn: 中国心理学家及教育家，曾任国立政治大学在台复校后的首任校长。
description.en: A Chinese psychologist and educator who served as the first president of National Chengchi University after its re-establishment in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的一个大学联盟系统，国立政治大学于2021年加入。
description.en: A university alliance system in Taiwan, which National Chengchi University joined in 2021.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国纽约市的私立研究型大学，曾与中央政治学校合办新闻学院。
description.en: A private research university in New York City, USA, which co-founded a journalism school with the Central Political School.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党于1927年5月20日创立中央党务学校，后于1929年更名为中央政治学校，旨在培养党务与政治干部。
description.en: The Kuomintang founded the Central Party Affairs School on May 20, 1927, which was later renamed the Central Political School in 1929, with the aim of training party and political cadres.

description.zh-cn: 三民主义青年团于1944年创立中央干部学校，以培养青年干部。
description.en: The Three Principles of the People Youth Corps founded the Central Cadre School in 1944 to train youth cadres.

description.zh-cn: 1947年，中央政治学校与中央干部学校合并，改组为国立政治大学。
description.en: In 1947, the Central Political School merged with the Central Cadre School and was reorganized into National Chengchi University.

description.zh-cn: 1947年，中央干部学校与中央政治学校合并，改组为国立政治大学。
description.en: In 1947, the Central Cadre School merged with the Central Political School and was reorganized into National Chengchi University.

description.zh-cn: 蒋中正自1927年中央党务学校成立起即担任校长，直至1946年学校改组。
description.en: Chiang Kai-shek served as the President since the establishment of the Central Party Affairs School in 1927 until its reorganization in 1946.

description.zh-cn: 蒋中正自1944年中央干部学校成立起担任校长。
description.en: Chiang Kai-shek served as the President of the Central Cadre School since its establishment in 1944.

description.zh-cn: 1944年中央干部学校成立时，蒋经国担任教育长。
description.en: When the Central Cadre School was established in 1944, Chiang Ching-kuo served as its Dean of Education.

description.zh-cn: 1947年学校改组为国立政治大学后，改隶中华民国教育部。
description.en: After its reorganization into National Chengchi University in 1947, the university came under the jurisdiction of the Ministry of Education of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 因第二次国共内战，国立政治大学于1949年在大陆停止办学。
description.en: Due to the Chinese Civil War, National Chengchi University ceased its operations on the mainland in 1949.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政府迁台后，推动了国立政治大学于1954年在台湾复校。
description.en: After the government of the Republic of China retreated to Taiwan, it facilitated the re-establishment of National Chengchi University in Taiwan in 1954.

description.zh-cn: 李登辉曾于国立政治大学任教。
description.en: Lee Teng-hui once taught at National Chengchi University.

description.zh-cn: 马英九曾于国立政治大学任教。
description.en: Ma Ying-jeou once taught at National Chengchi University.

description.zh-cn: 蔡英文曾于国立政治大学任教。
description.en: Tsai Ing-wen once taught at National Chengchi University.

description.zh-cn: 李元簇为国立政治大学校友。
description.en: Li Yuan-tsu is an alumnus of National Chengchi University.

description.zh-cn: 李元簇于1973年至1977年担任国立政治大学校长。
description.en: Li Yuan-tsu served as the President of National Chengchi University from 1973 to 1977.

description.zh-cn: 萧万长为国立政治大学校友。
description.en: Vincent Siew is an alumnus of National Chengchi University.

description.zh-cn: 顾毓琇于1947年至1949年担任国立政治大学在大陆时期的首任专任校长。
description.en: Y. H. Ku served as the first full-time president of National Chengchi University during its mainland period from 1947 to 1949.

description.zh-cn: 陈大齐于1955年至1959年担任国立政治大学在台复校后的首任校长。
description.en: Chen Daqi served as the first president of National Chengchi University after its re-establishment in Taiwan, from 1955 to 1959.

description.zh-cn: 2021年，国立政治大学成为台湾联合大学系统成员校。
description.en: In 2021, National Chengchi University became a member of the University System of Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 1943年，中央政治学校与美国哥伦比亚大学普利策新闻学院合办中央政治学校新闻学院。
description.en: In 1943, the Central Political School collaborated with Columbia University's Pulitzer School of Journalism to establish the Central Political School's Journalism College.
